mapper.select: select '1', id mkid, name mkname from ec1_marketing

SELECT mk.id mid, mk.name mname, pt.id pid FROM ec1_marketing mk, ec1_marketing_ec1_participate_c mktopt, ec1_participate pt WHERE mk.id = mktopt.ec1_marketing_ec1_participateec1_marketing_ida AND pt.id = mktopt.ec1_marketing_ec1_participateec1_participate_idb AND pt.partic_type = 'L1' AND mk.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

mapper.insert: insert into ec1_marketing (id, name, date_entered, date_modified, modified_user_id, created_by, deleted, assigned_user_id, st_dt, ed_dt, market_st, market_fee, description, desc_signup, desc_survey, desc_present) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateEntered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{edDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{marketSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descSignup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descSurvey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descPresent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ec1_marketing
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_entered = #{dateEntered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_modified = #{dateModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
assigned_user_id = #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},
st_dt = #{stDt,jdbcType=DATE},
ed_dt = #{edDt,jdbcType=DATE},
market_st = #{marketSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_fee = #{marketFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
desc_signup = #{descSignup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
desc_survey = #{descSurvey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
desc_present = #{descPresent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update ec1_marketing set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_entered = #{dateEntered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_modified = #{dateModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, assigned_user_id = #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, st_dt = #{stDt,jdbcType=DATE}, ed_dt = #{edDt,jdbcType=DATE}, market_st = #{marketSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_fee = #{marketFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, desc_signup = #{descSignup,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, desc_survey = #{descSurvey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, desc_present = #{descPresent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
